destinations.name: Kikuletwa Springs, Moshi, Tanzania
destinations.description: Kikuletwa springs, Chemka oasis is a unique phenomenon in the heart of Moshi, a few minutes drive from the highway

destinations.name: Themi Falls, Arusha, Tanzania
destinations.description: The themi falls leisure park is a restaurant, mini botanical garden next to a hidden waterfall in Arusha, Tanzania.

destinations.name: Oldonyo Orok Camp, Namanga, Kenya
destinations.description: A beautiful little gem hidden in Namanga overlooking the beautiful and lush Namanga Hills

destinations.name: Ngare Ndare Forest, Nanyuki, Kenya
destinations.description: Ngare Ndare forest is a lush indigenous forest at the northern foothills of Mt. Kenya.

destinations.name: Mafia Island, Zanzibar, Tanzania
destinations.description: Located off the coast of Tanzania, Mafia Island is a haven for those seeking a peaceful retreat from the hustle and bustle of city life

destinations.name: Ssese Islands, Lake Victoria, Uganda
destinations.description: The Ssese Islands are an archipelago of eighty-four islands in the northwestern part of Lake Victoria in Uganda.

destinations.name: Budongo Forest in Masindi, Uganda
destinations.description: This lush, ancient forest in Masindi is a birding paradise waiting to be explored.

destinations.name: Rusinga Island, Lake Victoria, Kisumu, Kenya
destinations.description: Rusinga Island lies to the East of Lake Victoria, in Homa Bay County, with the most stunning views of the lake.

destinations.name: Murchison Falls, Uganda
destinations.description: This is a waterfall at the apex of Lake Albert on the Victoria Nile in Uganda.
